com.i2group.apollo.client

Class ClientFactoryFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.i2group.apollo.client.ClientFactoryFactory

  • public final class ClientFactoryFactory
extends Object
    A factory for creating IClientFactorys that in turn can create clients for Intelligence Analysis Platform web services.
    Since:
    4.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IClientFactory createClientFactory(String url, Iterable<? extends IClientHandler> connectionHandlers)
      Creates and returns an IClientFactory for the Intelligence Analysis Platform deployment at the specified URL, using the specified IClientHandlers.
      static IClientFactory createClientFactory(String url, String username, String password)
      Creates and returns an IClientFactory for the Intelligence Analysis Platform deployment at the specified URL, with the specified user name and password.

    • Method Detail

      • createClientFactory

        public static IClientFactory createClientFactory(String url,
                                 Iterable<? extends IClientHandler> connectionHandlers)
        Creates and returns an IClientFactory for the Intelligence Analysis Platform deployment at the specified URL, using the specified IClientHandlers.

        As a minimum, the client handlers must be capable of authenticating clients with the Intelligence Analysis Platform, and providing the platform with time zone and locale information. The supplied LtpaAuthenticationHandler and LocaleAndTimeZoneHandler classes contain implementations of these basic requirements.

        Parameters:
        url - A String containing the URL of the Intelligence Analysis Platform deployment that clients created from the generated IClientFactory will connect to.
        connectionHandlers - The IClientHandlers that clients created from the generated IClientFactory will use.
        Returns:
        See above.

      • createClientFactory

        public static IClientFactory createClientFactory(String url,
                                 String username,
                                 String password)
        Creates and returns an IClientFactory for the Intelligence Analysis Platform deployment at the specified URL, with the specified user name and password.

        The clients that this factory creates use the locale and time zone specified by Locale.getDefault() and Calendar.getTimeZone(). They authenticate with the Intelligence Analysis Platform through an LtpaAuthenticationHandler that is configured with the supplied credentials.

        Parameters:
        url - A String containing the URL of the Intelligence Analysis Platform deployment that clients created from the generated IClientFactory will connect to.
        username - A String containing the user name that created clients will use to authenticate with the platform.
        password - A String containing the password that created clients will use to authenticate with the platform.
        Returns:
        See above.
